first_para: Gloria De Piero (born 21 December 1972) is a British Labour Party politician and journalist who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ashfield since 2010. She was previously known for her work on GMTV.

full.extract: Gloria De Piero (born 21 December 1972) is a British Labour Party politician and journalist who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ashfield since 2010. She was previously known for her work on GMTV.
full.title: Gloria De Piero
